about_the_game:
A collaboration DLC project between "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" and YouTube channel "Hayato's Ambition"!

  • To fulfill his next ambition, Hayatos will transform into a pixelated character and descend into the world of "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade"!?
  • From the YouTube channel "Hayato's Ambition", Hayatos will be added to the town of Portamaray as a new resident character.
  • Don't miss his special lines that can only be seen here!
  • A special residence supervised by him is also available. You can build only one in the town.
  • He also appear as powerful allies in business negotiation battles. Use your skills and offensive and tactical abilities to defeat them!


*After consultation with the distributor, it has been decided that the DLC will be distributed for free!

  • He also appear as powerful allies in business negotiation battles. Use your skills and offensive and tactical abilities to defeat them!

name: Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade - "Hayato's Ambition" Collaboration Commemorative Residentization DLC

supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
